fields.name: Contract
fields.description: Generates a contract code by combining address details and the number of seconds since the record was created, and uppercasing the result. Also includes the current status of the subscription.

fields.name: Total Quantity
fields.description: Calculates the total quantity of all products in the subscription

fields.name: Created Seconds
fields.description: Calculates the number of seconds since January 1, 1970 until the record was created.

fields.name: Postcode Id
fields.description: Combines the postal code, house number, letter, and addition into a unique address string.

fields.name: Volledige Naam
fields.description: Combines the first and last name fields to create a full name

fields.name: Abonnement Product
fields.description: Displays the quantity and the name of the chosen product together in a single field.

options.formula: IF(AND({fld7nmVWTWtquYHWr}, {fldpNIigZk6CMKsFO} = 'In Wachtrij', IS_AFTER(NOW(), DATEADD({fld7nmVWTWtquYHWr}, {fldvNMBbNotfcsHfx}))), TRUE(), FALSE())

fields.name: Mollie Send Trigger
fields.description: Determines when to trigger the Mollie payment send process based on the Process At date, Mollie Send Status, and Mollie Delay from the Invoice Batches table.

fields.name: SEPA Mandaat ID (from Mollie Mandate Id)

options.formula: IF(AND({fldtkgTtU105CuoDS}, {fld3RYGnTuuzsUXFV} = 'Klaar voor verzending', IS_AFTER(NOW(), {fldtkgTtU105CuoDS})), TRUE(), FALSE())

fields.name: Trigger
fields.description: Determines if the batch is ready to be processed based on the Send Batch date and the Status field

fields.name: Reinigingfrequentie
fields.description: Aantal reinigingen per jaar.

options.formula:
SWITCH({fldNd73JJgtcSXdnC},
  "Percentage Korting", CONCATENATE(ROUND({fldiCHd7e5qwD14nz}, 0), "% "),
  "Bedrag Korting", CONCATENATE("-€", {fldiCHd7e5qwD14nz}, " "),
  "Vast Bedrag", CONCATENATE("€", {fldiCHd7e5qwD14nz}, " Vast Bedrag ")
)

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Generates a summary sentence describing the discount type and amount, including the relevant product(s).

fields.name: Koppelings ID
fields.description: Returns the record ID of the linked Adres record

fields.name: Postcode Id
fields.description: Combines the postal code, house number, letter, and addition into a unique address string.

options.formula:
IF(
   AND(LEN({fldPrrlV0uEnRbQ6q}) > 0, LEN({fldir8Aw0dBxRUHhU}) > 0),
   CONCATENATE({fldeNYpEs4txYU4GA}, " ", {fldaWF2fPIm9aKdJO}, "-", {fldir8Aw0dBxRUHhU}, "-", {fldPrrlV0uEnRbQ6q}),
   IF(
      LEN({fldir8Aw0dBxRUHhU}) > 0,
      CONCATENATE({fldeNYpEs4txYU4GA}, " ", {fldaWF2fPIm9aKdJO}, "-", {fldir8Aw0dBxRUHhU}),
      IF(
         LEN({fldPrrlV0uEnRbQ6q}) > 0,
         CONCATENATE({fldeNYpEs4txYU4GA}, " ", {fldaWF2fPIm9aKdJO}, "-", {fldPrrlV0uEnRbQ6q}),
         CONCATENATE({fldeNYpEs4txYU4GA}, " ", {fldaWF2fPIm9aKdJO})
      )
   )
)

fields.name: Adres 1
fields.description: Combines the street name, house number, addition, and letter into a single formatted address string.

fields.name: Adres 2
fields.description: Combines the postal code and city into a formatted address string.

fields.name: File Name
fields.description: Extracts the file name from the File field, which contains a URL with the file name enclosed in parentheses.

fields.name: Totaal Basis Bedrag Rollup (from Subscription Items)

options.formula:
IF(
    FIND('SEPA Incasso', ARRAYJOIN({fldSfnqBJ5vYWqWll})),
    "Je hebt Klikokoning toestemming gegeven om het bedrag " & 
    SWITCH(
        {fldSfnqBJ5vYWqWll},
        'Maandelijks', 'maandelijks',
        'Jaarlijks', 'jaarlijks',
        'Kwartaal', 'per kwartaal',
        'Eenmalig', 'eenmalig'
    ) & 
    " van het rekeningnummer " & 
    ARRAYJOIN({fld3sqrrYWDoDx1V9}) & 
    " af te schrijven.",
    ""
)

fields.name: PDF - Toevoeging
fields.description: Generates an address suffix by using the 'Toevoeging' field if it exists, or the 'Letter' field if 'Toevoeging' does not exist. If both fields have values, it concatenates them with a '-' in between.

fields.name: PDF - Totaal
fields.description: Generates a formatted string that displays the total amount and payment frequency for the contract, taking into account any changes in the base amount.

fields.name: PDF - Totaal copy
fields.description: Generates a formatted string that displays the total amount and payment frequency for the contract, taking into account any changes in the base amount.

fields.name: PDF - Dealnaam
fields.description: Generates a string that combines the word 'Abonnement:' with the value from the 'Deals' field.

fields.name: PDF - Dealnaam copy
fields.description: Generates a string that combines the word 'Abonnement:' with the value from the 'Deals' field.
